title: Clarity & Balance 5 Piece Crystal Set (Fluorite/Amethyst)
description: The heart of Mother Nature is evident in these lavish Fluorite heart, point and moon shapes. This crystal can be found in a wide variety of different shades and colors, and each of them are as captivating as the next. Named the "Genius Stone", Fluorite is known to help increase focus and aid in decision making. The Amethyst 8mm Stretch Bracelet is one of the best gemstones for bringing high vibrations, gentle love, soft serenity, and an open aura. Radiate Power and clarity with this Clear Quartz Crystal Mini Sphere. Sparkling with glowing energy, Clear Quartz is known as the master of all healing crystals. These are natural Crystals and Gemstones, so each stone will be unique and have variations in natural characteristics such as Size, Shape, Inclusions, and Color.
